name: Hidden Object: Legend Of Sun Knight
name_original: Hidden Object: Legend Of Sun Knight
description:
An incredible adventure about the legend of the sun king . You have to go through more than 60 levels to solve the mystery about the legend of the sun king. Mini levels, bonus levels and secret levels will make you play and think

FEATURES:
- 60 Hidden Object Levels and Bonus Levels
- Addictive atmosphere of the game
- A huge map of the world
- Unique mini-games
- Beautiful scenes
